Document.Title: VBScript and ASP Code: Demonstrating the Buffer Property of the Response Object

Content:
<%@ LANGUAGE="VBScript" %> <% Option Explicit %> <% Response.Buffer = True Public Sub basDelaySec(Seconds) Dim dtmDate dtmDate = DateAdd("s", Seconds, Now) Do Loop Until Now > dtmDate End Sub %> Investor Force, Inc.

Waiting 2 seconds...

<% Response.Flush Call basDelaySec(2) %>

Waiting 5 seconds...

<% Response.Flush Call basDelaySec(5) %>

Waiting 10 seconds...

<% Response.Flush Call basDelaySec(10) %>

Done!
